source.d92145bb: id : A notation for a house date: Date house was sold price: Price is prediction target bedrooms: Number of bedrooms bathrooms: Number of bathrooms sqft_living: Square footage of the home sqft_lot: Square footage of the lot floors :Total floors (levels) in house waterfront :House which has a view to a waterfront view: Has been viewed condition :How good the condition is overall grade: overall grade given to the housing unit, based on King County grading system sqft_above : Square footage of house apart from basement sqft_basement: Square footage of the basement yr_built : Built Year yr_renovated : Year when house was renovated zipcode: Zip code lat: Latitude coordinate long: Longitude coordinate sqft_living15 : Living room area in 2015(implies-- some renovations) This might or might not have affected the lotsize area sqft_lot15 : LotSize area in 2015(implies-- some renovations)
